\part{Communication Engineering}

\chapter{Introduction}

\section{North Ameican Black and White Television (For Historical Purposes)}

The picture is divided into 525 lines, which constitute a frame.Each
frame is decomposed into two interlaced fields, each of which consits
of 262.5 lines.For convenience of presentation, we will we will refer
to the two fields as I and II.

\includegraphics{\string"Images/Engeneering/EE/Communication Engineering/ReducedSize/B&WRaster\string".jpg}

The time taken for each field to be scanned is 1/60 s .Correspondingly
the time taken for a frame or a complete picture to be scanned is
1/30 s. With 525 lines in a frame , the line scanning frequency is
15.75 kHz.
\end{document}
